Question: This person has said: "I've always thought songs written by two people are better than those written by one.
Hints: One of this person's first guitar heroes was Scotty Moore.
In August 2006 this person was granted a pardon by Arkansas governor Mike Huckabee for a 1975 reckless driving citation.
This person reprised his role in Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides, released in May 2011.
